changeSet.author: psbrandt

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from location as l, global_property as gp where l.name=gp.property_value and gp.property='default_location';

changeSet.sql: update global_property as gp, location as l set gp.property_value=l.name where l.location_id=1 and gp.property='default_location';

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM person where uuid='aa81a280-57e9-11e6-bc5b-507b9dc4c741';

changeSet.comment: Creating person object for user for the metadata creation
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO person(`gender`, `birthdate`, `birthdate_estimated`, `dead`, `death_date`, `cause_of_death`, `creator`, `date_created`, `changed_by`, `date_changed`, `voided`, `voided_by`, `date_voided`, `void_reason`, `uuid`) VALUES('M', '2000-12-01', 1, 0, NULL, NULL, 1, current_date, NULL, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'aa81a280-57e9-11e6-bc5b-507b9dc4c741');

changeSet.sql: SELECT user_id INTO @user_id FROM users where uuid='f9a19c60-57eb-11e6-a798-507b9dc4c741'; INSERT INTO user_role(`user_id`,`role`) VALUES(@user_id, 'System Developer');
